title: Fan, ca. 1895
description: Pleated fan with a leaf of painted black silk. Sticks are cut and painted wood. Ronot and Tutin were two artists who collaborated on painted fan leaves for Paris fan houses of the period. The large size of the fan is typical of the late 19th century.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, ca. 1895.
ca. 1895. Medium: painted silk (mount); painted wood (sticks). Bequest of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-6-129.
